Text: A very pointless chess version if there is one.

Thanks!

For it's time, it was an awesome, innovative game and the graphics made the game appealing enough to kids. Certainly not a strong game engine but it did a allow PC-to-PC gameplay.
Why name the torrent combat chess when the name of the game is clearly Battle chess?

i think i had a vwesion of this back in the day. where the queen strolls down the path shakeing her ass. hits the guy with an energy bolt and takes his place.
